tiles.name: Western Border
tiles.description: Edge of the scrubland clearing. Dusty earth mixed with sagebrush.

tiles.name: Northern Sagebrush
tiles.description: Patch of dense sagebrush, a common sight in this arid climate.

tiles.name: Eastern Outcrops
tiles.description: Rocky outcrops jutting from the dusty earth, marking the clearing's edge.

tiles.name: Central West Cacti
tiles.description: A cluster of cacti provides sparse shade in the desolate landscape.

tiles.name: Gnarled Joshua Tree
tiles.description: A lone, ancient Joshua tree stands as a central landmark. Likely used for avian clan meetings.

tiles.name: Central East Dust
tiles.description: Open expanse of dusty earth. Subtle avian territorial markers are present.

tiles.name: South West Trails
tiles.description: Dusty trails cross this part of the scrubland, possibly avian paths.

tiles.name: South Central Watering Hole (Potential)
tiles.description: A slight depression in the earth might indicate a hidden watering hole.

tiles.name: Southern Border
tiles.description: The clearing's southern border, mainly composed of dusty earth and sparse cacti.
